magicbook.gtlitecore.api.utils.stream

类 Gatherers

  • java.lang.Object
    • magicbook.gtlitecore.api.utils.stream.Gatherers

  • public final class Gatherers
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementations of Gatherer that provide useful intermediate operations, such as windowing functions, folding functions, transforming elements concurrently, e.t.c.

    • 方法详细资料

      • windowFixed

        public static <TR> Gatherer<TR,?,java.util.List<TR>> windowFixed(int windowSize)
        Returns a Gatherer that gathers elements into windows -- encounter-ordered groups of elements -- of a fixed size. If the stream is empty then no window will be produced. The last window may contain fewer elements than the supplied window size. For example: 
        
     // Will contains: [[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], [7, 8]]
     List<List<Integer>> windows = Stream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8)
     LazyStreams.gatherer(windows, Gatherers.windowFixed(3)).toList();
        类型参数:
        TR - The type of elements the returned gatherer consumes and the contents of the windows it produces.
        参数:
        windowSize - The size of the windows.
        返回:
        A new gatherer which groups elements into fixed-size windows.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When windowSize is less than 1.
